  • Packages that use SchemaStoreException

    com.zendesk.maxwell.recovery

    com.zendesk.maxwell.replication
    concerns the operation of the binlog replicator
    com.zendesk.maxwell.schema
    stores and updates (via SQL parsing) a view of the mysql schema

      Long SchemaStore.getSchemaID()
      Retrieve current schema id Schema id should be an always increasing integer, not current intended for use to refernce the schema, simply as a schema generation indicator.
